channel.title: Rustam Kovhaev's blog
channel.description: Recent content on Rustam Kovhaev's blog

item.title: Debugging a futex crash
item.description: I was enjoying my quiet afternoon, when an interesting application core has been submitted to me for research. And what made it interesting is that I did not have to load proprietary/private symbols fort the application that crashed. The first thing to check is whether the file is indeed a core file, and it turns out it is not. rusty@nuc10:~/futex$ file veeamagent.0.crash veeamagent.0.crash: ASCII text, with very long lines (44565) rusty@nuc10:~/futex$ head veeamagent.
